meta.name: description
meta.content: Explore Terraform product documentation, tutorials, and examples.

meta.name: twitter:description
meta.content: Explore Terraform product documentation, tutorials, and examples.

span.span: More sessions have been added to the conference agenda. Buy your pass and plan your schedule. Register

div.div: Get started in minutes with our cloud products

a.aria-label: HCP Vault Radar - Scan for embedded secrets
Validated Patterns - Field-tested patterns for using HashiCorp products

div.span: Field-tested patterns for using HashiCorp products

a.aria-label: Well-Architected Framework - Adopt HashiCorp best practices

button.class: disclosure_activator__pORI0 activator_root__pOfAQ dropdown-disclosure_activator__nGgNo navigation-header_userDropdownDisclosureActivator__RayIV g-focus-ring-from-box-shadow-dark activator_hasIcon__5HO6W g-focus-ring-from-box-shadow

a.aria-label: Community Forum. Opens in a new tab.
Support. Opens in a new tab.
GitHub. Opens in a new tab.
Terraform Registry. Opens in a new tab.

div.p: Terraform is an infrastructure as code tool that lets you build, change, and version infrastructure safely and efficiently. This includes low-level components like compute instances, storage, and networking; and high-level components like DNS entries and SaaS features.
Follow a code-complete, hands-on tutorial to learn the Terraform basics with your favorite infrastructure provider.

div.div: Automate your infrastructure provisioning at any scale

a.aria-label: Terraform Sandbox. Uses the following products: Terraform. Tutorial has interactive lab. 1 minute tutorial.

div.span: This sandbox contains preinstalled tools and services for you to experiment with Terraform.
Learn recommended style conventions for Terraform configuration and workflows.
Design your Terraform workflows for scale.
Describe infrastructure in Terraform configuration language.
Collaborate with your team to provision infrastructure.

a.aria-label: Deploy federated multi-cloud Kubernetes clusters. Uses the following products: Terraform, Consul. 25 minute tutorial.

div.span: Use Terraform to provision Kubernetes clusters in the Azure and AWS clouds, deploy Consul Helm charts enabling Consul federation, and deploy an example application on both clusters.

a.aria-label: Create preview environments with Terraform, GitHub Actions, and Vercel. Uses the following products: Terraform. 25 minute tutorial.

div.span: Create preview environments with Terraform, GitHub Actions, and Vercel

Configure HCP Terraform and GitHub Actions to create frontend and backend preview environments for your application. Dynamically create and destroy preview environments by opening, merging and closing pull requests.

a.aria-label: Deploy Lambda functions with TypeScript and CDK for Terraform. Uses the following products: Terraform. 12 minute tutorial.

div.span: Deploy Lambda functions with TypeScript and CDK for Terraform
Provision multiple AWS Lambda functions, S3 Buckets, and IAM roles that share the same TypeScript code in stacks, using CDK for Terraform (CDKTF).

a.aria-label: Build a golden image pipeline with HCP Packer. Uses the following products: Terraform, Packer. 43 minute tutorial.

div.span: Build a golden image pipeline with HCP Packer
Create a golden image pipeline with HCP Packer. Build an application image on the base with Packer and provision it on AWS with Terraform.

a.aria-label: Prepare for the Terraform Associate (003) Certification Exam

div.span: Prepare for the Terraform Associate (003) Certification Exam

Prepare for your Terraform Associate certification exam. Choose to follow an in-depth guide or to review select exam topics depending on the kind of preparation support you need. Then review sample questions to learn what to expect on exam day.
Progress through these tutorials to prepare for the Terraform Associate (003) certification exam.
